All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AcaciaTree
A variety of tree with the name "Acacia".
ActionsLog
Log system to record different Strings about the actions realized by the player or the npcs.
The main attribute of the ActionsLog object is a string (log) when the method registerAction(text) concatenate more text.
Whit method toString() we read the log.
Alcalde
Unused for now.
AlderTree
A variety of tree with the name "Alder".
AleatoricName
This class generate aleatoric names between different ranges for the min and max lenght.
The generated names are 'alien' or 'esoteric' like.
Alguacil
Unused for now.
Animal
Base object to create animals Each animal have a different name, type and icon
AspenTree
A variety of tree with the name "Aspen".
Baker
 
BasswoodTree
A variety of tree with the name "Basswood".
Bed
A piece of furniture named "Bed" and the icon "b"
BiomeGenerator
The methods of this object take a board and fill it with different kind of objects like trees for the forest or water for the rivers.
This object controlls the behavior of the algorithms used to generate the different biomes.
Blacksmith
A specialization of Man.
Board
This class store a 2 dimensional Objects array to simulate a map.
Butcher
 
Carpenter
A specialization of Man.
CedarTree
A variety of tree with the name "CedarTree".
Chair
A piece of furniture named "Chair" and the icon "c"
Chest
A piece of furniture named "Chest" and the icon "h"
CitizenList
This class store a ObjectsList for the citizens that populate the map.
Farmer
 
Fisherman
 
Fishmonger
 
Furniture
Base objet to create different types of furniture Each furniture have a name and a icon
GoldOreMineral
A variety of mineral resource named "An ore of gold".
graphicLauncher
The graphicLauncher its the main class of the project.
InteractController
That class controll the interactions between the map and the different Man objects.
Inventory
This class store a ObjectsList for different types of objects simulating the inventory of a character.
Lumberjack
A specialization of Man.
Man
Base object to create differents type of human beigns.
MinedGold
A variety of resource named "Mined gold".
Miner
A specialization of Man.
Money
This item is used like a 'wallet' to store money value on is quantity attribute.
MoveController
This class is used to move different Man objects inside the matrix of the Board.
Movement
This interface forces implementers to write the methods of the different movement actions on a board.
ObjectsList
This class is used to create differents arrays of objects.
Resource
Base object to create different type of resources like minerals, animals...
ResourcesList
This class store a ObjectsList to save the Resources in the map like the minerals or animals.
Shepherd
 
Table
A piece of furniture named "Table" and the icon "t"
Tree
A common tree template to create different type of trees.
Water
The functionality of the water object is to fill positions in the Board, so that it generates "rivers" whit "collision".
WoodPlanks
A variety of resource named "Wood planks", is icon is 's'.
The wooded planks are used by the Carpenter to create new Furniture using the createX() methods that are invoked on InteractController.
The wood planks are obtained by the Lumberjack using the method cutTree().
